Text: these are 2 min long webisodes from the Lego Ninjago website converted to avi and packaged into a batch torrent, a little appetiser and reminder that season 3 begins on Cartoon Nework on 18th July 2012 :)

HAHA!!! thanks despo1ler ! but my son is keeping me ever aware of the start date. it is funny when he comes to visit. after we have set & talked about everything he has been doing I finally get this question: Has despo1ler got anything new for me ??? thanks brother !!!
